quotes.text: Machine learning algorithms have achieved remarkable success in various domains, particularly in natural language processing and computer vision.
quotes.contextAfter: These advances have led to widespread adoption across industries.

citation.title: Advances in Machine Learning: A Comprehensive Survey
citation.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson, Prof. Michael Chen

quotes.text: The transformer architecture has fundamentally changed how we approach sequence-to-sequence tasks.
quotes.contextAfter: This has enabled breakthrough applications in translation and text generation.

citation.title: Advances in Machine Learning: A Comprehensive Survey
citation.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson, Prof. Michael Chen

provenance.sourceTitle: Advances in Machine Learning: A Comprehensive Survey
